name: beginning
Description: Time stamps indicate the beginning of a period covering the range up to but excluding the following time stamp.

name: end
Description: Time stamps indicate the end of a period covering the range up to but excluding the preceding time stamp.

name: middle
Description: Time stamps indicate the middle of a period beginning at the middle of the range described by this and the preceding time stamp and ending right before the middle of the range described by this and the following time stamp.
